rewards.name: £5 Voucher
rewards.description: £5 off your next purchase at Kerr & Smith.
rewards.additionalInfo: Enjoy an instant £5 discount on any purchase at Kerr & Smith Cumnock. Simply present your voucher code at checkout. Cannot be combined with other discounts or promotional offers.

rewards.name: 10% Off Service
rewards.description: Save 10% on your next vehicle service.
rewards.additionalInfo: Get 10% off labour and parts during your next service at Kerr & Smith Cumnock. Present your reward code when booking. Maximum discount value is £100. Not applicable to MOT tests or in combination with other service offers.

rewards.name: Free MOT
rewards.description: Complimentary MOT test at Kerr & Smith Cumnock.
rewards.additionalInfo: Redeem this reward for a free standard MOT at our Cumnock branch. Repairs or adjustments are not included. Please book at least 7 days in advance and mention your reward code when scheduling.

rewards.name: VIP Membership
rewards.description: Enjoy 12 months of VIP perks at Kerr & Smith.
rewards.additionalInfo: Unlock 12 months of VIP benefits including priority servicing, complimentary vehicle health checks, access to courtesy vehicles (subject to availability), and invitations to special events. Benefits activate within 48 hours of redemption and are linked to your customer account.
